name: victoriously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a victorious way (= having won a game, war, election, etc.): We raised our fists in the air victoriously and hugged each other. "We've beaten them!" he shouted victoriously. See
victorious
More examplesFewer examplesThey danced victoriously on the pitch. The revolutionaries victoriously entered the city.As the forces swept victoriously through the country, they seized hundreds of men.
